name: akaname
description:
Akaname


2464 x 3476    300dpi   

The akaname is a yōkai that lives in old bathhouses and dilapidated buildings that would sneak into places at night when people are asleep using its long tongue to lick the filth and grime sticking to bath places and bathtubs. In our case, he is a little more harmful than usual...

This is the first thing I drew after a traffic accident, which I broke my C4 neck bone and confined to bed for 6 months without creating, back in the 2017. It was made with traditional ways only with a pencil, charcoal pencil and ink pen. So, it has a special place in my hearth.
